profile.about: I'm adaptable and proactive, with a strong dedication to my work and a sturdy passion for learning. My goal is to earn the necessary skills to contribute to innovative projects and be committed to apply my knowledge on the continuous improvement of data-driven solutions.

portfolio.title: Projects
portfolio.p1-description: A module designed to generate preventive alerts to reduce agricultural losses within a farm's variou sowing.
portfolio.p2-description: A web system for managing sessions reservations, a main website and checking availability.
portfolio.p3-description: Software for managing a gym's POS and membership administration.
portfolio.p4-description: A database structure modeled for the storage and management of patient clinical records.
portfolio.p5-description: A prototype that maintains control of accounting accounts, transactional records, and financial closings.
portfolio.p6-description: Manages agricultural activities along with the control of farms and agricultural tasks.

footer.interestedAt: Focused on professional growth into the software development field
